title: Singapore to keep appreciating currency to cut inflation as Sri Lanka sees 12-month deflation
byline: Singapore does not have a policy rate, which allows macro-economists to print money to boost credit

title: Sri Lanka rupee trades stronger at 292.80/85 to dollar, bonds steady
byline: Rupee appreciates beyond 293 to US dollar

title: Sri Lanka deflation 0.8-pct in 12-months to October 2024, up 0.3-pct over 25 months
byline: The food price index fell 0.6 percent 231.9 points from 233.3 points
